title: (x) West Coast Cappers logo tech sans - Klavika {BJ Harvey}
content:
Hey everyone,

I am wrapping up some last minute typeface purchases and was curious about this one:

[http://www.brandsbyovo.com/images/brands/wcc\_id\_03.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010521/http:/www.brandsbyovo.com/images/brands/wcc_id_03.gif)

I believe it's being used in the new Chevrolet commercials as the typeface as well.

Happy New Year!  
–John

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wcc\_id\_03.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010521/http:/typophile.com/files/wcc_id_03.gif) | 5.05 KB |
author: feldhouse

comments.content:
looks a lot like [Klavika](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010521/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/klavika/index.html) — slightly  
bolder than the normal bold weight.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010521im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wcc_id_03_4192.gif)

Hildebrandt is a member here, and could probably confirm.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/14939](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010521/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14939 "http://www.typophile.com/node/14939")

Tim suggested it was Klavika, and Kyle didn't say otherwise, so I assume it is.

- Lex
